component.name: Chromium (Freeworld)
component.summary: Chromium built with all freeworld codecs and VA-API support

description.p: ungoogled-chromium is Chromium, sans integration with Google. It also features some tweaks to enhance privacy, control, and transparency (almost all of which require manual activation or enabling).

ungoogled-chromium retains the default Chromium experience as closely as possible. Unlike other Chromium forks that have their own visions of a web browser, ungoogled-chromium is essentially a drop-in replacement for Chromium.
This package comes with all freeworld codecs and VA-API support enabled.
